CustomField.description: the dial-out rate that will be applied to broadcast audio lines for operator-assisted calls as this is a new charge with Intercall.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The dial-out rate that will be applied to broadcast audio lines for operator-assisted calls as this is a new charge with Intercall. Please follow up with Beth if you have any questions
CustomField.label: *Broadcast Audio Notice

value.fullName: If Broadcast Audio is enabled on an operator-assisted audio event, the dial-out rate will be applied.
value.label: If Broadcast Audio is enabled on an operator-assisted audio event, the dial-out rate will be applied.
